PHRASE.LANG: Have your own cute virtual puppy follow you around everywhere you go. [#Legal]

Dein eigenes virtuelles Hündchen folgt dir überall hin. [#Legal]
Il tuo cucciolo di cane virtuale ti seguirà dovunque andrai. [#Legal]

この可愛い仔犬がどこまでもついてきてくれますよ。[#Legal]
자신만의 사랑스러운 강아지와 어디든 함께 가세요. [#Legal]
Have your own cute virtual puppy follow you around everywhere you go. [#Legal]
無論你走到哪裡，這隻可愛的虛擬小狗也會跟著你。 [#Legal]
